column4: this is getting really annoying... on my laptop, i had issue with 8.10, after an update the sounds inside firefox went away, 9.04 didnt solve the pb, 9.10 did, and now, after an update, I can only set the volume to max or min, which means either shouting like crazy or no sound at all!!! :(((((
and here on my desktop, if I play a video with 9.10, few seconds later, the sound goes away... until i readjust the system volume...
it's retarded! :((((((
yes, that would be annoying. what sound card do you have?
it's an integrated one; intel i believe
do you have the volume control at the top bar?
do you use the HDMI port?
I have intel inegrated audio too, and it works here
I hate net splits..
get a soundblaster sound kit then.. It has a external volume control
calm down..
I am using the same hardware, and it works here
so more likely it is a setup problem
do you have a HDMI port on the video card?
yes
that's most likely your problem
then disable it
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/X/Config/HDMI
i dont think that will help
It might, it might not, try
that is not exactly integrated intel is it..
http://ubuntuforums.org/archive/index.php/t-1255723.html
